CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) architecture are of particular interests since high performance devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) exceed 8% can be achieved.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSCs (Photovoltaic Cells)
2. BHJ (Bulk - Heterojunction)
3. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PSCs (Photovoltaic Cells)
2. BHJ (Bulk - Heterojunction)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs (Photovoltaic Cells) |
| BHJ (Bulk - Heterojunction) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) architecture are of particular interests since high performance devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) exceed 8% can be achieved.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE): This is the value of the efficiency with which the solar cells convert sunlight into electrical energy. It is expressed as a percentage.
2. Bulk - Heterojunction (BHJ): This is a type of solar cell architecture that is used to create high-performance devices.
3. High Performance: This is a general term used to describe devices that perform well or above average in terms of their efficiency or effectiveness.

These entities are identified as "Property Value" entities because they represent quantitative values or characteristics of the solar cells being discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE): This is the value of the efficiency with which the solar cells convert sunlight into electrical energy. It is expressed as a percentage.

So, the only entity that refers to the value of material properties in the paragraph is "Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE)".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
